|cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74K |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 600 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF1G18AC-TI; |flash1size = |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16IP-DI; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 78:81:02 |oui = 78:81:02 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = Linux;3.4.11; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 5-pin header,, J2 |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = GPON, VoIP, TR-069, |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = none |defaultssid = RT-GPON-XXXX, RT-5GPON-XXYY, MGTS-GPON-XXXX, MGTS-GPON5-XXYY |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = |availability = Rostelecom, MGTS |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 09/2017 |estprice = 93.72 |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43217T; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43465; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/broadband/xpon/bcm6838x-series BCM68380] (IFSBG TK1708 P20 2NM-16 Z2 W) GPON *Flash: ''Macronix'' [http://www.macronix.com/Lists/Datasheet/Attachments/6855/MX30LF1G18AC,%203V,%201Gb,%20v1.2.pdf MX30LF1G18AC-TI] - 128MB (T171110 8D162700) *RAM: ''Nanya'' [https://www.arrow.com/en/products/nt5cc128m16ip-di/nanya-technology NT5CC128M16IP-DI] - 256MB (1730 719028W0EF 3TW) *WiFi: [[Broadcom]] BCM43217 (TKMLG TD1649 P11114 1W), [https://www.broadcom.com/products/wireless/wireless-lan-infrastructure/bcm43465 BCM43465] *FXS SLIC: ''Microsemi'' [https://www.microsemi.com/product-directory/mislic-series-high-performance-line-circuits/4356-le9641 Le9641] (9641DUQC JA E3 1727MAB) :ONU: (FPE G36501DK 1735X) *Power: 12V / 2A ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.thg.ru/network/gpon_router_rv6699_mgts_review/index.html ''SerComm RV6699'' review on '''THG'''] (RU) *[https://rt.ru/sites/default/files/doc/Manual_Sercomm_RV_6699.pdf User Guide Rostelecom] (RU) *[https://mgts.ru/upload/contents/687/%D0%A0%D1%83%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%B4%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%BE_%D0%BF%D0%BE_%D1%8D%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%BF%D0%BB%D1%83%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%B8_ONT_SERCOM_RV6699.pdf User Guide MGTS] (RU) ===Forum threads=== *[http://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=775949 On '''4PDA''' forums] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
 < J2
1 - VCC
2 - GND
3 - Rx
4 - Tx
5 - N/C
===Partition layout (on stock firmware)=== 
0x000000000000-0x000000020000 : "CfeROM"
0x000000020000-0x000000160000 : "CfeRAM"
0x000000160000-0x000000200000 : "FlashMAP"
0x000000200000-0x0000002a0000 : "SN"
0x0000002a0000-0x0000003e0000 : "Protect"
0x0000003e0000-0x0000021e0000 : "Rootfs1"
0x0000021e0000-0x0000035e0000 : "Lib1"
0x0000035e0000-0x0000053e0000 : "Rootfs2"
0x0000053e0000-0x0000067e0000 : "Lib2"
0x0000067e0000-0x000006920000 : "Bootflg"
0x000006920000-0x000006ba0000 : "XMLConfig"
0x000006ba0000-0x0000070a0000 : "AppData"
0x000000000000-0x000000160000 : "Bootloader_Rom_Ram"
